name: Strong CYP3A4 induction decreases exposure of CYP3A4 substrates
actions: Consider alternatives to the inducer when therapeutic effect is critical.
Monitor for reduced efficacy of the affected drug.
Remember that induction effects are delayed and persist after discontinuation.

rationale: {B_name} induces CYP3A4, increasing metabolic capacity for {A_name}.
Induction develops over days to weeks and may persist after stopping {B_name}.

explanation_template: {B_name} strongly induces CYP3A4 and {A_name} is a CYP3A4 substrate. This can reduce {A_name} exposure over time, increasing the risk of reduced therapeutic effect.

references.citation: Mechanistic pattern: enzyme induction increases clearance and lowers exposure.
